participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Oliver is focused on his career goals and appreciates humor.
participant_1.background: i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan.

participant_2.personality: Laid-back and quirky, Liam enjoys gaming and has a playful sense of humor.
participant_2.background: i play a lot of call of duty. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. i like donuts. i drive a ford pinto. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.
